description: Retrieves the work units generated by the StartQueryPlanning operation.

parameters.name: QueryId
parameters.description: The ID of the plan query operation.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token for paginating the returned list of tokens, returned if the current segment of the list is not the last.

nested_items.name: QueryId
nested_items.description: The ID of the plan query operation.

nested_items.name: WorkUnitRanges
nested_items.description: A WorkUnitRangeList object that specifies the valid range of work unit IDs for querying the execution service.

nested_items.name: WorkUnitIdMax
nested_items.description: Defines the maximum work unit ID in the range. The maximum value is inclusive.

nested_items.name: WorkUnitIdMin
nested_items.description: Defines the minimum work unit ID in the range.

nested_items.name: WorkUnitToken
nested_items.description: A work token used to query the execution service.
